project.name: J-C839A-ELAS-04-ST03-DT02-DF06-CF02-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from an argument and uses it as a array accessor resulting in an ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exception.

iopair.description: Add data Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="2" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
